Funding: CFI, NSERC, SSHRC Publications: Many of my publications are available from http://users.cs.dal.ca/~jamie/pubs/. My favourite two publications to date are J. Blustein, D. Rowe, and A.-B. Graff. Making Sense in the Margins: A Field Study of Annotation. In International Conference on Theory and Practice of Digital Libraries (TPDL) 2011 (Berlin, Germany, 25-29 Sept. 2011) TPDL 2011. DOI=http://dx.doi.org/10.1007/978-3-642-24469-8_27. Blustein, J. and Noor, M. 2004. Personal glossaries on the WWW: An exploratory study (Hypertext). In Proceedings of the 2004 ACM Symposium on Document Engineering (Milwaukee, WI, USA, 28-30 Oct.2004). DocEng '04. ACM, New York, NY, 54-56. DOI= http://doi.acm.org/10.1145/1030397.1030409. Author's copy at: http://web.cs.dal.ca/~jamie/pubs/HTML/DocEng04/. Teaching: Details about the courses I teach are at http://web.cs.dal.ca/~jamie/course/.
